CustomField.description: Assigns a numerical value 1-5 based on the selection in the "Potential Impact" field.
CustomField.formula: CASE(ampi__Potential_Impact__c, "Almost None",5, "Minor",4, "Moderate",3, "Major",2, "Severe",1, "Casi sin Impacto",5, "Impacto Minimo",4, "Moderado",3, "Impacto Significativo",2, "Ocasiona Resoluci√≥n Anticipada o Problemas Graves",1, 0)
CustomField.label: Impact Value
